Name: Fire Axe
Flavor Text: What a way to make an entrance!
Long Description: The perfect tool for getting up close and personal with devastating impact.

Name: Matches
Long Description: Wood, phosphorus and a frictional surface combine to quickly reproduce one of mankind's greatest achievements over and over again.

Name: Glock 18C
Flavor Text: Is that a machine pistol in your pocket?
Long Description: A reliable handgun popular with law enforcement and military elite. Boasting a full auto mode that fires 1,200 rounds per minute. This pistol is non-negotiable 9 mm authority.

Name: First Aid Kit
Long Description: Kit of preparedness to treat most common ailments and wounds.

Name: S&W .44 Snub Nose
Long Description: A classic revolver that gained its reputation due to its precision and power. It hardly ever misfires, and can quickly be concealed in a pocket or waistband.

Name: Kalashnikov AK47
Flavor Text: Start your own reign of terror.
Long Description: Instantly recognized by its wooden stock and banana shaped magazine, this simple yet dependable weapon is the archetypal rifle of insurgents, freedom fighters, and terrorists across the globe.

Name: Medicinal Charcoal
Long Description: Mainly used for purification and highly recommended to treat poisoning and overdoses. The microporosity of the material is unsurpassed in terms of absorption.

Name: Army Boots
Flavor Text: These boots are made for walking.
Long Description: Military style boots honed for foot protection. Perfect for a variety of climates. They may seem clumsy, but the sore truth is that they always come out on top.

Name: Backpack
Long Description: Modern man found ergonomic ways to store items. These carry their weight in gold.

Name: Red Leather Jacket
Long Description: Candy apple red might not be the best camo, but you'll thrill them as you kill them.

Name: Ski Helmet
Long Description: Some helmets makes you look good, others make you look like a fool. This is the pretty non-bulletproof version.

Name: Combat Knife
Long Description: Rumor has it that really good steel comes from Sweden. Well honed, this knife will cut through just about anything.

Name: Small Box of Ammo
Long Description: Manufactured precision-made ammunition, stable and able. The best choice for your weapons.

Name: Shoulder Armor
Long Description: Both protection and enhancement in one. Makes you look beefed up and adds good protection against any blunt violence.

Name: Life Jacket
Long Description: Designed to hold a man's head above water and signal attention with bright color. These well-crafted padded jackets can withstand a punch or two. Keeps you bobbing up most unexpectedly.

Name: Gas Can
Flavor Text: Alluring fumes that'll go to your head.
Long Description: Key ingredient for most motorized vehicles, highly flammable and invaluable in the production of improvised incendiary weapons.

Name: Spray Cans
Flavor Text: Put some more color into this world.
Long Description: Color the world around you or inhale it to see perhaps even greater colors. Unknown duration.

Name: Shovel
Long Description: A basic tool refined with enhanced functionality. Can provide shelter, food, escape or discoveries.

Name: Dynamite
Long Description: Well rolled rods that, despite their size, will make quite an impression.
Additional info: Each additional stick adds +1 damage and +1" to radius.

Name: Small Stash
Long Description: The alluring glow to the little pile of valuables gives you a happy feeling. Someone’s been collecting. Now, it’s yours to cash in.

Name: Harpoon Gun
Flavor Text: Not just for for whaling, anymore.
Long Description: Quieter than most projectile weapons and more powerful than a sling shot. Works on land and in water. These are rarely found unmodified.

Name: Flashlight
Long Description: Packed with electrical lighting power to cut bright cones through darkness, shake or smack if not working properly.

Name: Wrench
Flavor Text: Sweat or blood, a tool fit for both trades.
Long Description: A real nut buster! The last tool a real mechanic would ever heft but still more flexible than everything else in the tool box. Loosen or tighten up - all in one.

Name: Metallic Lighter
Long Description: A fistful of torch. This small item is a true art of engineering, that can fire up under the most dire circumstances.

Name: Chainsaw
Long Description: Gasoline and electric versions exist. Both are very dangerous, but the roar of the gasoline version far outweighs the other in terms of intimidation.
Additional info: A natural 1 on the Fighting die (regardless of the Wild Die) hits the user instead.

Name: Remington 870
Long Description: A trusted pump-action shotgun issued in many variations. Owning one of these will change your life by ending others.

Name: Binoculars
Long Description: Good for spying from great distances. Some models feature zoom lenses or other extras.

Name: U-Lock
Long Description: Always make sure you secure your ride, prisoner or box of supplies thoroughly.

Name: Tobacco
Flavor Text: There are faster ways than this.
Long Description: For those special moments of personal reflection before or after the slaughter.

Name: Rope
Flavor Text: How long is a piece of rope? Now you know.
Long Description: High-quality fabric made to withstand stress and heavy loads. A hiker's item of choice.

Name: Running Shoes
Long Description: Made in faraway lands, by the best of hands. Soft rubber soles, and sturdy leather protection. A perfect fit for healthy feet. You´ll never want to run out of these.

Name: Fruit Plant
Long Description: Requires sun, moisture and human-friendly temperatures for the seeds to grow and bear fruit. Treat it with love. This is one of the few things in this world that actually gives something in return.

Name: M1 Combat Helmet
Flavor Text: Let me see your war face!
Long Description: Might just let you live to declare ”That was a close call!”.

Name: Sleeping Bag
Flavor Text: When it's cold outside and you want to sleep in.
Long Description: Crafted from lightweight fabrics. Designed to withstand Mother Nature’s shifting temperament. A vital piece of equipment that is highly sought after.

Name: Duct Tape
Flavor Text: If a strip of this doesn't fix it, nothing will.
Long Description: Highly reliable tech that grapples through stickiness. Can fix most damaged materials and keep it functioning - good enough.

Name: Rearview Mirror
Flavor Text: Objects may appear closer than they are.
Long Description: A fine polished reflective glass is a true multipurpose tool for survivors of all Eras.

Name: Compass
Flavor Text: A force unknown controls this device.
Long Description: A precision instrument for safe guidance if you know how to use it.

Name: Kneepads
Flavor Text: Down on your knees and feel good about it.
Long Description: When you have to quickly take a knee for that critical shot, a little bit of padding can help you keep your focus on target.

Name: Welding Helmet
Flavor Text: Protects your face from ugly marks.
Long Description: Block body fluids or splinters, hot or cold stuff. Features a tough visor that's easy to clean.

Name: Ring of Keys
Flavor Text: These might be the keys to Another World.
Long Description: People usually keep their valuables locked away. Keys fit into locks. Now just find the matching pairs.

Name: Plastic Bottles
Flavor Text: More common than fish in the sea.
Long Description: Durable, flexible container that holds liquids for survival or attack. They come in a variety of configurations

Name: Gas Mask
Long Description: Engineering at its best. It's made for hazardous environments where respiratory functions would be seriously damaged without filtration.

Name: Pillbox
Long Description: Created to alter the biological or mental state of the user. They can stop bleeding, treat insanity, induce hallucinations or put men to sleep. Most often they are taken orally, swallowed whole.

Name: Canned Food
Long Description: Thin metal container that preserves edibles. Often stacked as a status symbol in special cabinets, they usually contain vegetables or meat. Special tools may be used to open them efficiently.

Name: Fine Hardbound Book
Flavor Text: Someone had a lot to say.
Long Description: Intellectual property should not to be underestimated. With a book in your hand you might come out as a pundit instead of a bandit.

Name: Thick Blanket
Long Description: When the nights and the seasons are against you, hug this one a little tighter.

Name: Scotch
Flavor Text: Liquid courage in the form of single or blended.
Long Description: Comes in many shapes, but once emptied becomes, "the best I ever had."

Name: Crowbar
Long Description: A solid piece of equipment, well worth its weight. Once you start using it, you can’t be without it.

Name: Trenchcoat
Long Description: Excellent to conceal contraband on your body, or more mundanely, keep your arms and legs dry in harsh weather conditions.

Name: Oil Lamp
Long Description: The best substitute for a lamp in any low tech society. Any hardcore prepper's first choice of light source.

Name: Glasses of Seeing
Flavor Text: Put these on and a new world might be revealed.
Long Description: Glasses come in all forms and shapes but they most often make you look like someone not to hit in the face.

Name: Waterflask
Flavor Text: Bring your own drink to the party.
Long Description: For longer journeys you always need a reliable container. Never miss a chance to fill 'er up!

Name: Fire Extinguisher
Long Description: Pressure filled canister for dousing flames in awkward places. Can kill a fire in a blink of an eye if handled properly.

Name: Roadsign Shield
Long Description: A punched lightweight sheet of metal, bendable, but sturdy as well. Found everywhere, usually perforated and corroded, but one or two in mint condition is a real haul.
Additional info: +1 Parry. +2 Armor to ranged shots that hit.

Name: BB gun
Long Description: Pneumatic guns are fun to play with, but when you're facing something bigger than a rat, run!

Name: Dry Ration
Long Description: Work up some good saliva before you take a bite out of this. The Lembas bread of the future does not come with anything but as a filler of empty stomachs.

Name: Field Dressing
Flavor Text: Only break the sealing when you really have to.
Long Description: Sterile compress, everything you need to stop serious bleeding.

Name: Fishing Gear
Long Description: Getting in tune with nature, biding time in silence in contrast to the actual catching is what it's all about.

Name: Home made 22
Flavor Text: Jerk, load, shoot in that order.
Long Description: Home made weapons should always be handled with the utmost respect, with the safety always off you don't want to put this loaded piece down your waistline.

Name: Hoodie
Long Description: The heavy fabric has a life of its own, made for dousing off some place safe.

Name: Rusty Kitchen Knife
Long Description: You most often find useful tools in what used to be called kitchens.

Name: Pocket Knife
Flavor Text: No excuse for having dirty finger nails.
Long Description: An ancient pocket knife with wooden handle and carbon steel blade, all you'll ever need. No?

Name: Toilet rail mace
Long Description: Most commonly found near senior villages and often the most basic weapon for hooligans.

Name: Scarf
Flavor Text: A garment without a uniform meaning.
Long Description: Fashion-statement, political identification, cleaning rag, unwrapped carrying container. This long, broad piece of fabric has many uses...

Name: Slingshot
Flavor Text: Suddenly the ground is littered with ammunition.
Long Description: Silent, cheap and effective all in one, never leave you crib without it.

Name: Snare Trap
Long Description: Look at the patterns, use bait and lure the little ones into it. Not for anything bigger than rabbits.

Name: Sweat Pants
Long Description: Feel every bit as cozy and free wearing these. Not very tough but more comfy than any leg wear out there.

Name: T-shirt
Flavor Text: The meaning of the print is long forgotten.
Long Description: In the old world there seems to have been many tribes, all with different

Name: Cans of Water
Long Description: Emergency water with some extra iron to it. Do not shake. A recommendation would be to poor this one like a good ale and let it rest for a good while.

Name: Wind Jacket
Flavor Text: At the right angle this one still works.
Long Description: It's like wearing nothing with holes in it. Once, (when without holes) this must have been something extra special.

Name: Worn Boots
Long Description: If you run out of ammo just throw these at the enemy, the stench might catch them off guard.

Name: Worn Trousers
Long Description: It's hard to tell what kind of material these are made out of, but as you stretch you can tell they're not made for any tip-tap shit.
